LAYOUT.title: Settings
LAYOUT.description: Manage your account settings and adjust preferences

teamSettings.title: Settings
teamSettings.description: Manage your account settings and adjust preferences

language.title: Language
language.description: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.

select.title: Choose Language
select.description: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.

PAGE.title: Create your team
PAGE.description: Give your team a name and select the default language it will use. This will be the place where you and your team will accomplish great things together!
PAGE.name: Your team name

PAGE.cardDescription: Create and manage your team's assistants
PAGE.name: Name
PAGE.createYourAssistantDescription: Customize your assistant in a few steps: define instructions, add information sources, and adjust its tone of voice.

LAYOUT.cardDescription: Manage your account settings and adjust preferences

subdomain.title: Custom Domain
subdomain.description: Customize how others see your team on the website by configuring your team's URL or connecting a custom domain.
subdomain.urlDescription: When you enter a URL and click validate, we will check for invalid characters and correct them for you if needed. We will also check if the URL is already taken. If so, you will need to change your text.
subdomain.teamSubdomainDuplicate: This subdomain is already in use

domain.title: Adjust your custom domain
domain.description: This is how others will see you on the site.

PAGE.title: Team Settings
PAGE.description: Customize how your team appears to others within the platform
PAGE.name: Team name
PAGE.nameDescription: You can use your real name, a pseudonym, or a name that represents your organization. Note that you can only change it every 30 days.
PAGE.urlDescription: The next team URL will cause a redirection to the new URL.

logo.title: Logo and favicon
logo.description: Upload custom images to identify your team
logo.recommendedSize: The logo is displayed in visible areas within the platform

favicon.title: Favicon images
favicon.description: The favicon is the icon that appears in the browser when visiting your custom domain.
favicon.recommendedSize: The favicon appears in the browser when visiting your custom domain.

delete.title: Danger Zone
delete.description: Once you delete the team account, there is no going back. Please be sure. All your uploaded data and trained GPT assistants will be deleted. This action is irreversible.

PAGE.title: Welcome Message
PAGE.description: Configure how users see your welcome message on the website.
PAGE.name: Team name
PAGE.nameDescription: This is your public name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym.

avatar.recommendedSize: Upload a custom avatar image to represent the assistant.

welcomeMessage.title: Your message
welcomeMessage.description: Write the welcome message that will be displayed to users.

menu.headerDescription: Add links to your website or blog.
menu.menuHeaderTitleDescription: These values will appear first and most prominently
menu.menuBodyDescription: Add additional links (e.g., Instagram, LinkedIn, or Legal Terms).

banner.title: Information Banner
banner.description: Customize an informational message that will be displayed in the website menu.
banner.textDescription: This text will be the body of the banner

footer.title: Footer message
footer.description: Write a short and clear message here, for example, a legal note, information about artificial intelligence, or any relevant notice.
footer.textPlaceholder: I generate responses with artificial intelligence and may make mistakes.

PAGE.title: Plans
PAGE.description: Manage your plan and billing options.

plans.title: Hobby
plans.includedPlus: Everything included in the free plan, plus...
plans.allIncluded: All features from the free plan included

plans.title: Standard
plans.includedPlus: Everything included in the Hobby plan, plus...
plans.allIncluded: All features from the free plan included

plans.title: Unlimited
plans.includedPlus: Everything included in the free plan, plus...
plans.allIncluded: All features from the free plan included
features: 40,000 message credits/month (messages exceeding this limit will use your OpenAI API key)

LAYOUT.title: Activity
LAYOUT.description: Manage your assistant's activity and access conversation logs and detailed analytics.

LAYOUT.title: Connect
LAYOUT.description: Manage how to share and integrate your assistant with other tools and platforms.

url.title: Share link
url.desription: Share the link to your team page so other users can access your assistant.

chat.title: Team URL
chat.description: This link provides direct access to your assistant.

script.title: Share your assistant on your website
script.description: Copy the following code to integrate the assistant into your website and allow users to interact with it directly

chat.title: Code to integrate the assistant
chat.description: Paste this code on your website to display the assistant bubble.

newInstructions.title: Write your assistant's instructions
newInstructions.description: Define how you want your assistant to function. Write clear and specific guidelines that will direct its responses for a personalized and consistent experience.
newInstructions.subName: Remember: good instructions are key for an effective assistant!

archives.title: Files
archives.description: Select files to train the assistant. (Supported file types: .pdf, .doc, .docx, .txt)
archives.name: Name
archives.textDragAndDrop: Drag and drop files here or
archives.supportedFiles: Supported files: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT

PAGE.title: Write your assistant's instructions
PAGE.description: Define how you want your assistant to function. Write clear and specific guidelines that will direct its responses for a personalized and consistent experience.
PAGE.subName: Remember: good instructions are key for an effective assistant!

PAGE.title: Testing Zone
PAGE.description: The Playground allows you to experiment with different configurations without affecting the live chatbot.

adjustments.title: Settings
adjustments.temperatureDescription: How creative should the assistant be?
adjustments.topPDescription: How varied should the assistant be?
adjustments.error: There was an error saving the changes

LAYOUT.cardDescription: Manage your assistant's settings and adjust preferences
LAYOUT.actionErrorText: There was an error during the update

GENERAL.title: Assistant Settings
GENERAL.desription: Customize how your assistant is displayed within the platform.

assistantName.title: Assistant Name
assistantName.description: This is your public display name. It can be your real name or a pseudonym. You can only change this once every 30 days.

assistantUrl.title: Assistant URL
assistantUrl.description: The upcoming Team URL will cause a redirect to the new URL.

delete.title: Delete Assistant
delete.description: If you delete this assistant, there will be no way to recover it. All uploaded data and trained chatbots will be lost. This action is irreversible.

INTERFACE.title: Customize Your Assistant's Card
INTERFACE.desription: Create an attractive card for your assistant by adding an emoji, a title, and a description. This information will help users better understand the purpose and personality of your assistant.

emoji.title: Assistant Emoji
emoji.titlePlaceholder: Write a title for your assistant (e.g., Customer Support).
emoji.titleDesciptiontion: This title will be visible to users and should briefly describe your assistant's purpose.
emoji.descriptionPlaceholder: Write a detailed description (e.g., 'I can help you with product questions, orders, or technical issues').
emoji.descriptionDescription: Briefly explain what your assistant does and how it can help users.

LAYOUT.title: Sources
LAYOUT.description: Manage the information sources that the assistant uses to respond to user queries. Uploaded sources help the assistant find the appropriate content based on requests.
